description:
With the Four Kings on the brink of death, the Four-Beasts is triumphant, but Toriko and friends have one last trick up their sleeves to save the human race!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Burst! Curiosity About the Flavor! The Four Kings` Combined Skill!
Sakuretsu! Aji e no Koukishin! Shitennou Gattai Waza!!
炸裂! 味への好奇心! 四天王合体技!!
